footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 09/23/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Primordial Jade Cutter__ The high Crit Rate substat and HP% passive makes it the best choice for Kuki's personal damage.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Lion's Roar, Festering Desire, Iron Sting, Favonius Sword
